title: Invalid write with by-copy generic tuple

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

body:
```
fn fst<T, U>(+pair: (T, U)) -> T {                                                                                                                                             
    let (t, _) = pair;                                                                                                                                                        
    ret t;                                                                                                                                                                    
}                                                                                                                                                                             

fn main() {                                                                                                                                                                   
    fst((10, 20));                                                                                                                                                            
}        
```
